nsfw.name: NSFW

nsfw.footer: *All NSFW commands are based on Reddit. NOT cherry picked.*

tickets.name: Tickets
tickets.description: These commands are related to the bot's tickets system

field.name: **How to create support tickets:**
field.value:
**1.** Set the support team / staff role in the dashboard by doing /settings and setting the Support Role
**2.** Set the ticket's category channel by doing /settings and setting the Ticket Category
**3.** Set a log channel by doing /settings and setting the Ticket Log Channel (Optional)
**4.** Execute /help supportpanel if you want to use a reaction or button to create a ticket
**5.** Create a ticket to test it out

utilities.name: Utilities
utilities.description: These commands are useful for some situations

actions.name: Actions
actions.description: These commands let you do stuff to people
actions.footer: *All these commands can be suffixed with a user @ to do the action on them.*

supportpanel.name: Support Panel (Admin only)
supportpanel.description: This command sends a message that has a button to open tickets
